file_content.text: Spice harvest = liquidated // White Maw income = trifling
The spice has been destroyed, and the pirates along with it.
News = joyous // B2-44 = confirming mission completion
Imperial Command = pleased // Appreciation = plentiful
The pirates had a good idea. The Empire should think about getting into that market.
You ought to sell spice, too.
Recommendation = intriguing // B2-44 = passing suggestion on to Imperial Command
Goodbye.
Can I go now?
Mission = success // Business = concluded
Spice = bad for health // Distribution of spice = reprehensible
B2-44 = welcoming + clandestine // Forthcoming intel = urgent + classified
White Maw monetary resources = unusually high // Imperial Command = identified source of financial sustenance
White Maw = harvesting spice locally // Rare strain = highly illegal + highly profitable
An entire crop of spice, growing right under our noses? That won't do.
That's unacceptable.
B2-44 = concurs // Situation = bad + getting worse
What are the pirates doing with their ill-gotten wealth?
What are they buying?
Some people prefer a dishonest living.
What I do isn't legal, either.
White Maws = not authorized for extralegal activities
Neutralize the buyers. Cut off the credit flow.
Don't let them sell the stuff.
Operation = galaxy-wide // Neutralizing supply = easier
Rare strain?
Addictive properties = magnified // Single dose + brain = lifelong consumer
Nothing could grow out here.
Rare spice strain = thrives in cold // Hoth = ideal cultivating grounds
Profits from spice = weapon purchases // Pirate armament = growing exponentially
Imperial Command = requests immediate destruction of spice operation // B2-44 = authorized to inform Command of willing mission participant?
Imperial Command = requests immediate destruction of spice operation // B2-44 = authorized to inform Command of willing mission participants?
No point in letting the pirates sell all that spice.
Yes, I'll do it.
This'll be a cinch.
B2-44 = confirming mission acceptance // Reaction = gratitude
Target = spice crops + White Maw harvesters // Additional destruction of property = encouraged
Count me out. [Refuse quest]
Crisis = looming
B2-44 = acquiring intel
